description.value:
Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 18, Rise of the Runelords Player's Guide pg. 11, Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 209, Inner Sea World Guide pg. 290, Adventurer's Armory pg. 0, Advanced Race Guide pg. 117

Statistics

Cost 8 gp Weight 1 lb.

Damage 1d4 (small), 1d6 (medium); Critical 19-20/x2; Range -; Type S; Special fragile

Category Light; Proficiency Martial

Weapon Groups Blades, Light

Description

This short, curved blade was created by goblins, who often drill numerous holes into it in an attempt to reduce its weight. Most dogslicers are sized for Small creatures.
